title: linux bluetooth
snippet: linux bluetooth1. 基础命令1. installinstall pakage bitbake bluez52. rfkillrfkill list3. hciconfighciconfig hci0 up/down	#打开关闭蓝牙4. bluetoothctlsystemctl start bluetoothbluetoothctldbus-monitor --system|--session2. 使用~#: lsusb	#查看硬件Bus 003 Device 001: ID 1d6b:0003 Linux Foundation 3.0 root hubBus 001 Device 003: ID 8087:0aa7 Intel Corp. Wireless-AC 3168 BluetoothBus 001 Device 004: ID 2c7c:0125 Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd. EC25 ~#: hciconfig hci0 up	打开蓝牙~#: hcitool scan	扫描蓝牙设备 官网资料https://computingforgeeks.com/connect-to-bluetooth-device-from-linux-terminal/
